product_name: Osprey IsoForm4 CM Custom Moldable Hipbelt - Women's
long_description: Personalize your Osprey Ariel backpack with an Osprey IsoForm4 CM hipbelt customized just for you. Dual-density foam can be heat molded to fit your every curve! Providing superior load support and comfort, this gender-specific hipbelt is made with 3-D dual-density foam that is contoured and anatomically shaped. The foam technology in IsoForm4 CM hipbelts allows heat-molding for a custom fit. Osprey's certified Custom Molding available in most stores-check your local REI store for a custom hipbelt molding oven.
short_description: Personalize your Osprey Ariel backpack with an Osprey IsoForm4 CM hipbelt customized just for you. Dual-density foam can be heat molded to fit your every curve!
